values.title: Professional Legacy, Trusted Partnership
values.subtitle: Two Decades of Legal Excellence
values.description: Since our establishment in 2004, Harry R. Song & Associates has upheld the principles of professionalism, integrity, and responsibility. With over 20 years of rich experience, we deeply understand the responsibility and mission behind legal practice. As your trusted legal advisor, we continue to provide the most reliable legal protection for every client with our professional attitude and practical approach.

members.name: Harry R. Song
members.title: Principal Lawyer
members.description: Over 20 years of experience, specializing in immigration law, property law and commercial law

content.paragraph_1: Founder and Principal Lawyer of Harry R. Song & Associates, Barrister and Solicitor of the Supreme Court of Victoria and High Court of Australia, Vice President of Australia Jiangsu Chamber of Commerce.
content.paragraph_2: Graduated from Shandong University Law School in 1985, served as a prosecutor at Jiangsu Provincial People's Procuratorate for over a decade. Later pursued further studies in Australia, obtaining a law degree from Monash University, one of Australia's Group of Eight universities. Subsequently worked at a prominent local law firm before establishing Harry R. Song & Associates, specializing in immigration law, property law, and commercial law.

items.value: Professional expertise, dedicated service, teamwork, and mutual growth
